title: Criminal procedure overview
textSnippet: Criminal procedure sets the cadence of the state's power. Prosecutors must show early, the accused gains counsel, and the court protects due process

title: RP criminal procedure flow
textSnippet: In campaign play, you may want a tighter loop. Here's a popular RP variant that still nods to core due process ideas

title: What is law?
textSnippet: US law is built on layers. Legislatures pass s, agencies craft , and courts publish opinions

title: Sources of law
textSnippet: In the US system, constitutions sit at the top. The federal Constitution binds everyone, while state constitutions control within their borders unless the steps in

title: Precedent and hierarchy
textSnippet: Hierarchy keeps the common law coherent. Vertical means lower courts follow higher ones
